home.name: Muhammed
home.description: I create modern, responsive websites using Vue.js and React. Passionate about clean code and beautiful user experiences.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Explore my web development projects and applications

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.short: Full-stack online store with shopping cart
ecommerce.full: A complete e-commerce platform built with Vue.js and Django. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, order management, and payment integration. The platform is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices.

task.title: Task Management App
task.short: Productivity tool for managing daily tasks
task.full: An intuitive task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, priority levels, due dates, and team collaboration features. Built with React and features real-time updates using WebSockets.

weather.title: Weather Dashboard
weather.full: A beautiful weather dashboard that displays current weather conditions, 7-day forecasts, and interactive weather maps. Integrates with OpenWeather API and features location-based weather detection.

analytics.title: Data Analytics Tool
analytics.full: A comprehensive data analytics platform built with Python and Django. Features include data import/export, statistical analysis, interactive charts and graphs, and customizable dashboards for business intelligence.

portfolioSite.title: Portfolio Website
portfolioSite.full: A sleek and modern portfolio website showcasing web development projects. Features smooth animations, dark theme, responsive design, and optimized performance. Built with Vue.js and modern CSS techniques.

social.title: Social Media Dashboard
social.full: A comprehensive social media analytics dashboard that aggregates data from multiple platforms. Features include engagement metrics, growth tracking, content scheduling, and detailed reporting with exportable charts.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.subtitle: From my first steps in web development to becoming a professional front-end developer
journey.intro: My name is Mohammed, I am a front-end developer. My passion for web technologies began with HTML and CSS, then I mastered JavaScript and React and Vue.js, creating interactive websites and projects for my portfolio.
journey.challengesDesc: It was difficult to master JavaScript right away, but practice and projects helped me consolidate my knowledge. Every bug became a learning opportunity, and every challenge made me a stronger developer.
journey.achievementsDesc: Successfully completed multiple projects including responsive websites, interactive web applications with Vue.js and React, and backend development with Python and Django.

2022.title: First Website
2022.desc: Learned HTML and CSS, created my first web page. This was the beginning of my journey into web development, discovering the magic of bringing designs to life in a browser.
2022.label: First Project

2023.title: Learning JavaScript
2023.desc: After mastering JavaScript, I moved on to learning React and Vue.js. I understood how to create dynamic and interactive user experiences. I began building more complex applications and studied modern development practices
2023.label: JS Projects

2024.title: Portfolio Development
2024.desc: Created projects with responsive design and animations. Focused on creating beautiful, accessible, and performant web applications. Learned advanced CSS techniques and modern frameworks.
2024.label: Portfolio

2025.title: Complex Projects
2025.desc: Developed interactive websites with ChatBot, dark theme, and advanced features. Working on full-stack applications combining frontend excellence with backend power using Django and Python.
2025.label: Advanced Apps

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's work together to create something amazing
contact.description: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, questions, or just a friendly chat about web development.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters
contact.success: Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.

chatbot.title: Chat with me
chatbot.greeting: Hi! How can I help you today?
chatbot.offline: I'm currently offline, but I'll respond to your email soon!
